articles.description: WhatsApp added several new features during the year 2020. While some of these features were in the works since 2019, others got added this year. Here’s look at 10 biggest new features that WhatsApp got in 2020 ...
articles.content: Till sometime back, WhatsApp users could set only one wallpaper for all the chats. Last month, the company introduced the feature of customisable wallpapers. Using this feature, users can now send di… [+87 chars]
